text: Today on the West Coast, it's looking fun with 3 ft @9s WNW swell and light E winds at 11 mph. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are your best bets, especially from mid-morning to mid-afternoon. Tomorrow drops to 2 ft @8s NW with fresh E winds, making it a bit choppyâ€”Dunaverty might be worth a look. The day after, similar conditions persist with 2 ft @8s, but Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay still have some playful options. Best: today.
